sentences.sContent: The modern-day sex symbol has now taken the place of the old-fashioned hero of yesteryear.
sentences.sCn: 当今的性感偶像已经取代了往昔过时的英雄形象。

trans.tranCn: 去年 ad过去不久的岁月
trans.tranOther: You use yesteryear to refer to the past, often a period in the past with a set of values or a way of life that no longer exists
